# disable_learning { #ANNarchy.core.Global.disable_learning }

```python
disable_learning(projections=None, net_id=0)
```

Disables learning for all projections.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name        | Type   | Description                                                                                               | Default   |
|-------------|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| projections |        | the projections whose learning should be disabled. By default, all the existing projections are disabled. | `None`    |
